IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE EDUCATIONAL AND RELIGIOUS INSTRUCTION TO STUDENTS IN KINDERGARTEN THROUGH GRADE 12.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TRINITY CHRISTIAN SCHOOL OF FAIRFAX EXISTS AS A COMMUNITY OF BELIEVERS IN JESUS CHRIST WHO DESIRE TO RAISE THEIR CHILDREN IN THE HISTORIC CHRISTIAN FAITH. AS A DISCIPLESHIP SCHOOL SEEKING TO EDUCATE THE CHILDREN OF CHRISTIAN PARENTS, OUR GOAL IS THAT THE HOME, THE SCHOOL, AND THE CHURCH WILL BE IN CONSONANT AGREEMENT REGARDING THE TRUTH AND AUTHORITY OF HOLY SCRIPTURE AND THE PERSON AND WORK OF OUR LORD JESUS CHRIST, AND THUS ABLE TO CONSISTENTLY SPEAK THE SAME TRUTH INTO THE LIVES OF OUR CHILDREN. OUR COMMUNITY STRIVES TO NURTURE STUDENTS SO THAT GOD'S IMAGE IS MANIFESTED IN EACH OF THEM AS THEY WALK HUMBLY WITH GOD IN THEIR MINDS, LOVE MERCY IN THEIR HEARTS, AND ACT JUSTLY IN THEIR LIVES.
IRS990.Desc: A CHRISTIAN SCHOOL OFFERING INSTRUCTION TO STUDENTS IN KINDERGARTEN THROUGH GRADE 12.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL EVALUATES UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAX POSITIONS BASED ON A MORE-LIKELY-THAN-NOT RECOGNITION STANDARD. IF THAT THRESHOLD IS MET, THE TAX POSITION IS THEN MEASURED AT THE LARGEST AMOUNT THAT IS GREATER THAN 50% LIKELY OF BEING REALIZED UPON ULTIMATE SETTLEMENT. AS OF JUNE 30, 2023, THERE ARE NO ACCRUALS FOR UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS. IF APPLICABLE, THE SCHOOL RECORDS INTEREST AND PENALTIES AS A COMPONENT OF INCOME TAX EXPENSE. TAX YEARS FROM 2020 THROUGH THE CURRENT YEAR REMAIN OPEN FOR EXAMINATION BY TAX AUTHORITIES.
THE ORGANIZATION HAS PUBLICIZED ITS RACIALLY NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICY ON ITS WEBSITE AND IN ITS ADMISSIONS MATERIALS.
ALL TUITION ASSISTANCE IS TRACKED IN THE TUITION ACCOUNTING RECORDS. NO OTHER FORM OF ASSISTANCE OR GRANT IS GIVEN.
THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDED BONUS COMPENSATION TO ITS OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES DURING THE YEAR.
THE NUMBER IN COLUMN (B) REPRESENTS THE NUMBER OF CONTRIBUTIONS RECEIVED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FINANCE COMMITTEE REVIEWS FORM 990 PRIOR TO FILING, AND PRESENTS IT TO THE BOARD. COPIES ARE MADE AVAILABLE TO ALL BOARD MEMBERS PRIOR TO FILING THE FORM 990 WITH THE IRS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES CONSIDERS CONFLICTS OF INTEREST ON AN ONGOING BASIS. ALL BOARD MEMBERS, OFFICERS, AND KEY EMPLOYEES DISCLOSE TO THE BOARD ANY POSSIBLE CONFLICT OF INTEREST AT THE EARLIEST PRACTICABLE TIME.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE COMMITTEE ON TRUSTEES IS RESPONSIBLE FOR SETTING HEAD OF SCHOOL COMPENSATION BY PROVIDING AN ANNUAL PERFORMANCE REVIEW AND ESTABLISHING ANNUAL GOALS FOR THE HEAD OF SCHOOL'S PERFORMANCE. AS PART OF THE PERFORMANCE REVIEW, THE COMMITTEE INTERVIEWS KEY EMPLOYEES FOR FEEDBACK ON THE HEAD OF SCHOOL'S PERFORMANCE DURING THE PREVIOUS YEAR. THE COMMITTEE ALSO REVIEWS SALARY SURVEYS FROM THE NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF INDEPENDENT SCHOOLS (NAIS) AND INDEPENDENT SCHOOL MANAGEMENT (ISM). THE COMMITTEE BRINGS ITS RECOMMENDATION TO THE FULL BOARD FOR APPROVAL. THE HEAD OF SCHOOL IS RESPONSIBLE FOR SETTING KEY EMPLOYEE COMPENSATION AND DOES SO BY REVIEWING SALARY SURVEYS FROM NAIS, ISM AND THE NATIONAL BUSINESS OFFICER'S ASSOCIATION (NBOA).

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 AND THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE ON THE ECFA WEBSITE (WWW.EFCA.ORG). THE ORGANIZATION'S CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS AVAILABLE TO PUBLIC UPON WRITTEN REQUEST.
THERE WERE NO CHANGES TO THE ORGANIZATION'S OVERSIGHT PROCESS OR SELECTION PROCESS DURING THE TAX YEAR.
